body:
Comment 4 by **lars.pensjo**: 
I installed the code review extensions, but when running "hg clpatch 4559046" I get the
error message "cannot run hg clpatch outside default branch".

Using the hg import instead succeeded (the targeted file was updated). After all.bash
and rebuild of my program, I confirm that there is no longer the unexpected messages
that was the reason for this issue report.

I do get another unexpected behaviour from my program (reading data from file that looks
as if it is truncated). However, for the moment I can't say that is not a bug of my own,
and I will investigate.
